entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Westlock
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
